page.title: 15Barkestone medical care
page.content: When babies are born the mums look after their babies.The babies are usally wrapped in cloth or towels.When the mum comes home with her baby the nurse checks in every so often to see how the baby is.The nurse also comes to children at the school and she looks at your hair and finger nails and toes and eyes .When you have got a cough you don't have to go to hospital but if you have stitches you do.You don't stay in to have stitches but if you break your leg you do have to stay in hospital.If you an operation you have to stay in hospital as well.There are hospitals in Nottingham Grantham Newark and Melton.The biggest hospital is Nottingham hospital which is called queens medical centre.
